metadata.title: CVE-2021-42613 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: A double free in cleanup_index in index.c in Halibut 1.2 allows an attacker to cause a denial of service or possibly have other unspecified impact via a crafted text document.

criterions.comment: halibut package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
